H0.text: In which country is the Mekong Delta. Thailand

H1.text: In which country is the Mekong Delta. Cambodia

H2.text: In which country is the Mekong Delta. Laos

H3.text: In which country is the Mekong Delta. SRVN

A4.text: After 1975, the Mekong Delta ceased being a part of the Republic of Vietnam, succeeded by the current Vietnamese nation.

A5.text: The Mekong Delta region encompasses a large portion of south-western Vietnam, of an area of over 40,500 km2 (15,600 sq mi).
